document_data.name: Uldar
document_data.mainbody: '''Uldar''' was an alcoholic drink brewed and exported out of [[Eshpurta]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: Uldar was a slightly bitter and highly alcoholic drink of pale yellow hue. The drink was a good accompaniment for [[nut]]s and [[cheese]]. Despite its decent quality, Uldar was considered a low-brow libation.
document_data.Availability: The [[Harfin Draether]] tavern and eatery in [[Athkatla]]'s [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]] served Uldar among its many other drinks; however, it was considered to be no better than a mouthwash by the snobby locals.
